Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the alarm name, such as TestAlarm.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ARN of the CloudWatchalarm, such as   arn:aws:cloudwatch:us-west-2:123456789012:alarm:myCloudWatchAlarm-CPUAlarm-UXMMZK36R55Z.
